Uses of Package
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing

  • Packages that use com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing 
    Package Description
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.compilation  
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history  
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing
    Provides the API for tracing of flow execution.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation  
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.execution  
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows
    Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.history  
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.tracing
    Provides a tracing FlowVisitor implementation which constructs a TracedAction.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.compilation 
    Class and Description
    TracedFlowExecution
    A FlowExecution which emits trace messages correlated with a TraceMap of the flow that will be executed.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history 
    Class and Description
    TraceEventListener
    A listener which receives trace events from executing flows.
    TraceMap
    A map of the trace of a flow.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing 
    Class and Description
    FlowStepType 
    TraceMap
    A map of the trace of a flow.

  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.execution 
    Class and Description
    TracedAction
    An Action which notifies a TraceEventListener of trace events correlated with a TraceMap.
    TracedFlowExecution
    A FlowExecution which emits trace messages correlated with a TraceMap of the flow that will be executed.
    TraceMap
    A map of the trace of a flow.
